text: Henry Morris may refer to: *Henry Morris (MP) (by 1536–1572/3), MP for Devizes *Sir Henry Morris, 1st Baronet (1844–1926), British medical doctor * Henry Morris (1874–1945), aka Énrí Ó Muirgheasa, Irish scholar *Henry Morris (education) (1889–1961), English Education Officer who developed the Village college *Henry M. Morris (1918–2006), young earth creationist, hydrologist, scholar, and apologist; father of the creation science movement *Henry Morris (footballer) (1919–1993), Scottish international footballer ==See also== *Henry Maurice (disambiguation) *Henry Morris-Jones (1884–1972), Welsh doctor, soldier and politician *Harry Morris (disambiguation)
title: Henry Morris
